DataSource.Query: SELECT items.item_code, items.item_name, item_groups.item_group_name, suppliers.supplier_name, items.cost_price, items.selling_price, inventory.count_item_in_stock(items.item_id, items.unit_id, @StoreId) count, items.reorder_level, items.reorder_quantity FROM inventory.items JOIN inventory.item_groups ON items.item_group_id = item_groups.item_group_id JOIN inventory.brands ON items.brand_id = brands.brand_id JOIN inventory.suppliers ON items.preferred_supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE items.deleted = 0 AND items.maintain_inventory = 1 AND inventory.count_item_in_stock(items.item_id, items.unit_id, @StoreId) <= 0;
